activities: Exostar processes personal information received from the EU primarily for operation of the Exostar Exchange, including for purposes of user registration, user communications on the Exostar Exchange, and tracking of user usage of the Exostar Exchange.  Exostar also processes such information to interact with users of the Exostar Exchange and other EU current and prospective customers, including in connection with other other services provided by the company.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU and Swiss data protection authorities
